content.question: The three pendulums are each displaced by a small angle from equilibrium and released. Which of the following options correctly compares the periods <math alttext="T sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>, <math alttext="T sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>, and <math alttext="T sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></math> of the pendulums?

choices.label: <math alttext="T sub A is greater than T sub B, which equals T sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="T sub A is greater than T sub B, which is greater than T sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="T sub C is greater than T sub A, which is greater than T sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="T sub C is greater than T sub B, which is greater than T sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="T sub C is greater than T sub A, which is greater than T sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
